{{Actor| | type = Decoration | name = Anvil | class = Anvil | game = Strife | doomednum = 194 | convid = 279 }}[[Classes]]: Anvil
A black iron anvil, found mainly in armor shops. Serves no other purpose than being a decoration. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR Anvil { {{Property|Radius}} 16 {{Property|Height}} 32 +{{Flag|SOLID}} States { Spawn: ANVL A -1 Stop } }
